thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-K2M Group Holdings Q4 Loss Per Share $0.20

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-K2M Group Holdings Q4 Loss Per Share $0.20
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - K2m Group Holdings Inc:
* K2M GROUP HOLDINGS, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.20 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 9.7 PERCENT TO $67.8 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP 9 TO 10 PERCENT * SEES 2018 TOTAL REVENUE ON AN AS REPORTED BASIS IN RANGE OF $280.0 MILLION TO $284.0 MILLION
* SEES 2018 TOTAL NET LOSS OF $34.0 MILLION TO $30.0 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.19, REVENUE VIEW $66.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.56, REVENUE VIEW $282.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
